p: Antibodies used in this study were rabbit polyclonal antibody against VP1 of enterovirus D68 (Genetex, 132134, 1:250 dilution), rabbit polyclonal antibody against glial fibrillary acidic protein (GFAP) (Abcam, ab53554), and rabbit polyclonal allograft inflammatory factor (Iba1) (Wako, 019-19741). Donkey fluorophore-conjugated secondary antibodies (Jackson Laboratory, 1:500 dilution) were used together with DAPI (4â€²,6-diamidino-2-phenylindole; Thermo Scientific, 62248, 1:1,000 dilution) and NeuroTrace Nissl stain (Life Technologies, N21483).
